languages.text: "В Девятнадцатом Ифритском слабаков не держат. Извини за это убогое позорище, которое я устроила. Хреновая была идея".
"The 19th Efreet Regiment doesn't put up with weaklings. Forgive me for that sorry display back there. Bloody awful idea."
languages.original_text: "В Девятнадцатом Ифритском слабаков не держат. Извини за это убогое позорище, которое я устроила. Хреновая была идея".

traits.locale_text: "The 19th Efreet Regiment doesn't put up with weaklings. Forgive me for that sorry display back there. Bloody awful idea."

"The 19th Efreet Regiment doesn't put up with weaklings. Forgive me for that sorry display back there. Bloody awful idea."
"The 19th Efreet Regiment doesn't put up with weaklings. Forgive me for that sorry display back there. Bloody awful idea."

languages.text: “艾弗里特第十九师团从不容忍废物。请原谅我刚刚的行为，这个主意真他妈的烂透了。”
languages.original_text: "The 19th Efreet Regiment doesn't put up with weaklings. Forgive me for that sorry display back there. Bloody awful idea."

traits.locale_text: “艾弗里特第十九师团从不容忍废物。请原谅我刚刚的行为，这个主意真他妈的烂透了。”

languages.text: 「イフリート第19連隊は、弱虫を許さないんだ。さっきのことは、ごめんなさい。まったく持って酷いアイデアだった」
languages.original_text: "The 19th Efreet Regiment doesn't put up with weaklings. Forgive me for that sorry display back there. Bloody awful idea."

traits.locale_text: 「イフリート第19連隊は、弱虫を許さないんだ。さっきのことは、ごめんなさい。まったく持って酷いアイデアだった」

languages.text: «El 19.º regimiento de Efreet no tolera a los pusilánimes. Le pido perdón por mi lamentable conducta. Fue una idea malísima».
languages.original_text: "The 19th Efreet Regiment doesn't put up with weaklings. Forgive me for that sorry display back there. Bloody awful idea."

traits.locale_text: «El 19.º regimiento de Efreet no tolera a los pusilánimes. Le pido perdón por mi lamentable conducta. Fue una idea malísima».

languages.text: « On tolère pas les avortons, dans le 19e régiment d'Éfrit. Pardonnez-moi pour ce spectacle affligeant. C'était une idée à la con. »
languages.original_text: "The 19th Efreet Regiment doesn't put up with weaklings. Forgive me for that sorry display back there. Bloody awful idea."

traits.locale_text: « On tolère pas les avortons, dans le 19e régiment d'Éfrit. Pardonnez-moi pour ce spectacle affligeant. C'était une idée à la con. »

languages.text: "Das 19. Efreet-Regiment duldet keine Schwächlinge. Verzeiht mir für die traurige Vorstellung. Furchtbar schlechte Idee."
languages.original_text: "The 19th Efreet Regiment doesn't put up with weaklings. Forgive me for that sorry display back there. Bloody awful idea."

traits.locale_text: "Das 19. Efreet-Regiment duldet keine Schwächlinge. Verzeiht mir für die traurige Vorstellung. Furchtbar schlechte Idee."

languages.text: "19. İfrit Alayı eziklere müsamaha göstermez. Az önceki acınası sahne için üzgünüm. Berbat bir fikirdi."
languages.original_text: "The 19th Efreet Regiment doesn't put up with weaklings. Forgive me for that sorry display back there. Bloody awful idea."
